dc.title: Congressman Ron Lewis, Second District of Kentucky - Homepage
dc.description: Ron Lewis has represented Kentucky's Second District since first being sworn in to Congress on May 26th, 1994. The Second District is home to Fort Knox, Mammoth Cave National Park, the birthplace of Abraham Lincoln, and over 50,000 people who depend on agriculture for a living.
